attribute.name: height
attribute.description: HTML: Overrides the natural height of this image, by specifying height in pixels.

attribute.name: ismap
attribute.description: HTML: Specifies server-side image map handling for this image.

attribute.name: longdesc
attribute.description: HTML: A link to a long description of the image.

attribute.name: usemap
attribute.description: HTML: Specifies an image map to use with this image.

attribute.name: width
attribute.description: HTML: Overrides the natural width of this image, by specifying width in pixels.
